answerText: Thomas Mann[10] This novel by Thomas Mann is initially set on Meng Strasse in Lubeck where the children Tom, Christian, and Tony enjoy the commercial success of their father Johann.
heading: Penn Bowl |2013 | 11 | 17 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This author wrote the four-part Joseph and His Brothers and wrote about the relationship between Goethe and Charlotte Kestner in Lotte in Weimar. [10] Name this author who is more famous for writing about Gustav von Aschenbach in Death in Venice.
